author: VR Gorilla - Virtual Reality & 360 Videos
description:
Step into the spotlight with Dutch country sensation Waylon in this unique VR experience, filmed live at the iconic Poppodium Boerderij. Feel the energy up close as he performs his powerful hit Thanks But No Thanks—as if you're standing right there on stage.

Photo by Monica Duffels.

Click the *Join* button now to become a VR Gorilla YouTube member, unlocking access to the full video and our complete collection of full-length videos. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6AXBF-78lNa3_TjAIWZWmQ/join

VR Gorilla is an Amsterdam-based virtual reality production studio. We aim to create the most immersive, enthralling experiences imaginable. We want to give you new experiences and take you places you have never been. We want to tell stories like you’ve never seen and heard them before.
title: Waylon - Thanks But No Thanks (Live) - 360 VR 3D
